'''Heartbreak Balloons''' are objects found in the archery challenge [[Bullseye Balloons]] in the Windblume Festival.

When they are popped, the player will lose points.

The design is similar to [[Klee]]'s bombs ([[Jumpy Dumpty]]) and one of her possessions, [[Dodoco]].

==Events==
*[[Invitation of Windblume]], Bullseye Balloons
